Check the result of a workbench command

Source: R/check_wb_result.R
check_wb_result.Rd

Validates the outcome of a wb_command execution by inspecting the exit status and whether the expected output file was produced.

Usage

check_wb_result(
  res,
  fe_before = NA,
  fe_after = NA,
  outfile = NULL,
  cmd_name = NULL
)

Arguments

res

The return value from system().

fe_before

Logical; did the output file exist before execution?

fe_after

Logical; does the output file exist after execution?

outfile

Path to the expected output file.

cmd_name

The command name, for diagnostic messages.

Value

res, invisibly.
